definitions.definition: A particular position in American football , often a running back who lines up near the line of scrimmage and can function as a wide receiver .
A particular position in Canadian football , similar to a hybrid between wide receiver and running back .

main_definition: ( American football ) A particular position in American football , often a running back who lines up near the line of scrimmage and can function as a wide receiver .
secondary_definitions: ( Canadian football ) A particular position in Canadian football , similar to a hybrid between wide receiver and running back .
